name: Magnetic (Tenyardsgame)
description:
Game Submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2021: Stronger Together

WASD - Control Move

Left mouse click - Shoot 

You play as a magnet and collect as many screw as you can. Each time you collect a screw/power, you become stronger. However, enemies also become stronger as well when you collect screw/power. Defeat the enemies, find the escape gate. 

Normal playthrough mode & Endless mode

Ps. Didn't know where to find SFX/Music, and still uncertain how to add sound. My first complete game and game jam. Any criticism/feedback is welcomed.
